banner.title: TP WorkLife 10/12
banner.mainContentHeadline: The podcast where science meets business
banner.mainContent: From fixing meetings to finding a mentor, get new insights to help you enjoy your time at work and thrive in your career.

videoData.title: The value of an eclectic streaming queue
videoData.socialTitle: The value of an eclectic streaming queue
videoData.description: When you collapse in front of the TV after a long day, do you always end up watching the same few shows and movies the algorithm serves up to everyone? If so, engineer and movie enthusiast Sid Thatham believes you're missing out. Thatham lays out the myriad potential rewards for diversifying your streaming habits and venturing into unexplored corners of the storytelling landscape.
